name: Rolling Ball Sky Drop And Fall
name_original: Rolling Ball Sky Drop And Fall
description:
The Rolling Ball Sky Drop offers awesome dynamics at your fingertips. It is a simple gameplay but with awesome crescendos. Here you need to roll the ball downwards.

Gameplay:

• The ball needs to move downwards
• If you miss, you are gone
• Tap left/right to move the ball downward

Download the game on your device. It will prove to be a superb wonderful study of your reflex and an entertainment unlimited with addictive challenging gameplay.
